sentences.en: Men fantasize as a substitute for acting out forbidden desires.
sentences.cn: 人们以幻想来作为宣泄禁欲的替代方式。

sentences.en: At times when my work gets me down, I like to fantasize about being a farmer.
sentences.cn: 当我为工作沮丧时，就爱幻想成为一个农夫。

sentences.en: As constant travelers and parents of a 2-year-old, we sometimes fantasize about how much work we can do when one of us gets on a plane, undistracted by phones, friends, or movies.
sentences.cn: 作为经常旅行的人，以及两岁孩子的父母，我们有时会幻想，当我们中的一个人登上飞机，不被手机、朋友或电影分心时，我们能做多少工作。
